quote: What @steipete has built with @clawdbot is out of this world.
author: KrauseFx

quote: Rebuilt my entire site via Telegram while watching Netflix in bed. Notion → Astro, 18 posts migrated, DNS moved to Cloudflare. Never opened my laptop.
author: davekiss

quote: Using @clawdbot for a week and it genuinely feels like early AGI. The gap between 'what I can imagine' and 'what actually works' has never been smaller.
author: tobi_bsf

quote: Finds my next flight in email, runs through check-in, finds me a window seat. While I'm driving.
author: armanddp

quote: Everything Siri was supposed to be. And it goes so much further.
author: crossiBuilds

quote: Remember when Siri was supposed to be the future? That future exists now - it's just not from Apple or Google. Self-hosted AI that actually remembers things, messages proactively, runs 24/7 on a $5/month server.
author: velvet_shark

quote: A megacorp like Anthropic or OpenAI could not build this. Literally impossible with how corpo works.
author: Dimillian

quote: Cleared 10,000+ emails from my inbox (45% reduction!)
author: jdrhyne

quote: Less than 24 hours in: cleaned up Linear issues, wrote email follow-ups, opened 3 PRs, prospected new signups.
author: avi_press

quote: Completely hooked. Integrated emails, home assistant, homelab via SSH, todo list, Apple Notes, shopping list. All via a single Telegram chat.
author: acevail_

quote: Named him Jarvis. Daily briefings, calendar checks, reminds me when to leave for pickleball based on traffic.
author: BraydonCoyer

quote: Autonomous Claude Code loops from my phone. 'fix tests' via Telegram. Runs the loop, sends progress every 5 iterations.
author: php100

quote: 24 hours later, the idea turned into a project pulling 4 million posts across 100 top X accounts.
author: andrewjiang

quote: Big talk I know, but @clawdbot is the best agentic system I've used since Claude Code itself.
author: hey_zilla

quote: @clawdbot has done my taxes. @steipete really cooked here.
author: sharoni_k

quote: Now my home's PM. Wife and I drop topics anytime, Clawd researches, Sunday 9am sends the roundup.
author: tonylongname

quote: Catching fun vibes I haven't felt since I first got into computers 30 years ago.
author: buddyhadry

quote: This is legit the only 'agent' / model / whatever-you-call-this-but-probably-agi that I have seen that's actually funny.
author: LLMJunky

quote: Within an hour, had it monitoring my full release workflow—gh actions, npm publish—alerting me when done!
author: shuv1337

quote: Processed our entire source of truth via WhatsApp in minutes, where RAG agents struggled for days.
author: pocarles

quote: Wanted a way for it to have access to my courses/assignments at uni. Asked it to build a skill - it did and started using it on its own.
author: pranavkarthik__

quote: Knew my voice, my weird abbreviations, my 2am panic debugging sessions. Made me feel like a real developer.
author: xMikeMickelson

quote: Most fun experience in days. Haven't slept much but oh boy is my life getting automated.
author: thekitze

quote: Too lazy to search. Asked @clawdbot to search emails for me, he goes through email, finds pdf, gives me numbers. Good bot.
author: jjpcodes

quote: @clawdbot is absolute game changer for me. The amount of things I done from my phone just during my breakfast is absolutely breathtaking.
author: SedRicKCZ

quote: Clawdbot > anything GPT will ever release. Most fun I've had building in my entire life.
author: Giebz

quote: A glimpse into the future of how normal people will use AI.
author: tysonhutchins_

quote: Feels like the best buddy you always wanted. For me this is 'alpha AGI'.
author: OliNorwell

quote: LOVE that it can edit its own system prompt and skills on the fly then hot-reload them.
author: hey_zilla

quote: This mf called @steipete has achieved AGI with @clawdbot
author: rmedranollamas

quote: Excellent reading thank you. Love oracle and Clawd.
author: karpathy
